plot: A pretty,40-something Marbella socialite is looking for a millionaire to settle down with, a man in accordance with her life style. When she thinks to have found Mr Right, it turns out that destiny has something else in store for her.
plot_en: A pretty,40-something Marbella socialite is looking for a millionaire to settle down with, a man in accordance with her life style. When she thinks to have found Mr Right, it turns out that destiny has something else in store for her.
plot_es: A pretty,40-something Marbella socialite is looking for a millionaire to settle down with, a man in accordance with her life style. When she thinks to have found Mr Right, it turns out that destiny has something else in store for her.
title: La Ambiciosa de Marbella
